articles.author: Rachel Siegel
articles.title: Nobel economics prize awarded for studies of prosperity gaps between countries - The Washington Post
articles.description: Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson and James A. Robinson examined how different kinds of European colonization led to some nations being rich and others poor.
articles.content: The Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences was awarded Monday to Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson and James A. Robinson, a trio of economists working at U.S. universities, for research on prosperity … [+4059 chars]

articles.author: Marie Boran
articles.title: Hurricane Milton's Path Predicted With 'Unbelievable Accuracy'—Here's Why - Newsweek
articles.description: A new AI-driven weather model from a European research institute predicted Hurricane Milton's landfall within 13 miles.
articles.content: A weather model driven by artificial intelligence has stunned meteorologists by predicting Hurricane Milton's landfall within 7 miles on average—outperforming traditional models by almost 100 miles.… [+5668 chars]
